entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 p.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 6.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
